File Spec.Label: Respondent-ID
Assigned by your federal regulatory agency. Format is right-justified and zero-filled.

File Spec.Label: Loan/Application Number
Unique identifier across the home office and branch sites

File Spec.Label: Date Application Received
Format is ccyymmdd or NA left-justified

File Spec.Label: Loan Amount
Report in thousands, round to the nearest thousand with leading zeros and without commas

File Spec.Label: Metropolitan Statistical Area/Metropolitan Division
Metropolitan Statistical Area or Metropolitan Division (if appropriate) code or NA left-justified

File Spec.Label: State Code
FIPS code with leading zerosor NA left-justified

File Spec.Label: County Code
FIPS code with leading zeros or NA left-justified

File Spec.Label: Census Tract
Include decimal point and any leading or trailing zeros or NA left-justified

File Spec.Label: Applicant Income
Report in thousands, round to the nearest thousand with leading zeros and without commas or NA left-justified

File Spec.Label: Rate Spread
Enter the rate spread to two decimal places. Include the decimal point and any leading or trailing zeros or NA left-justified

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Application/Loan number must not = blank or all zeros.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Application/Loan number not in valid format or is missing

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Date application received must be in CCYYMMDD format; month and day must be in the range 01-12 and 01-31, respectively or equal NA. CCYY must be numeric and CC (century) must equal 19 or 20.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Application Month, day, year and/or century not valid

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If Action taken type = 6, then date application received must = NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan was purchased; therefore application date must equal NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If Action taken type = 6, then date application received must = NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan was purchased; therefore application date must equal NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Loan type must = 1, 2, 3, or 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan type is missing or is not in range 1-4

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Property type must = 1, 2, or 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Property type is missing or is not in range 1-3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Loan purpose must = 1, 2, or 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan purpose is missing or is not in range 1-3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If lien status = 3, then loan purpose must = 2.
Loan/Application Register (only).Control: Lien status = 3; therefore loan purpose must = 2

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Occupancy must = 1, 2, or 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Occupancy is missing or does not equal 1, 2, or 3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Loan amount must be numeric and > zero.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan amount is not numeric or not > 0

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Preapproval must = 1, 2, or 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Preapproval is missing or is not in range 1-3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If loan purpose = 1 and action taken type = 6, then preapproval must = 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan purpose = 1 and action taken type = 6; therefore preapproval must = 3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If loan purpose = 2 or 3, then preapproval must = 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan purpose = 2 or 3 and preapproval is missing or does not = 3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If action taken type = 7 or 8, then preapproval must = 1.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken type = 7 or 8 and preapproval is missing or does not = 1

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Action taken type must = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, or 8.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken type is missing or not in range 1-8

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If reasons for denial are in the range 1-9, then action taken type must = 3 or 7.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Application or preapproval not denied, but denial reasons given

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If date application received = NA, then action taken type must = 6.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Date application received = NA; therefore action taken type must = 6

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If preapproval = 1, then action taken type must = 1-5, 7 or 8.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Preapproval = 1 and action taken type is missing or does not = 1-5, 7 or 8

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If preapproval = 2, then action taken type must = 1-5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Preapproval = 2 and action taken type is missing or does not = 1-5

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If preapproval = 3, then action taken type must = 1-6.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Preapproval = 3 and action taken type is missing or does not = 1-6

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Action taken date must be in CCYYMMDD format; month and day must be in the range 01-12 and 01-31, respectively. CCYY must be numeric.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken date is invalid format and/or date

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Century (CC) and Year (YY) of action taken date must = activity century/year (CCYY) for period being processed.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Century and/or year for action taken date does not match activity century/year

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If date application received does not = NA, then action taken date must be ≥ date application received.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken date is earlier than application date

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: MSA/MD must = a valid Metropolitan Statistical Area or Metropolitan Division (if appropriate) code for period being processed or NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: MSA/MD number does not = a valid Metropolitan Statistical Area/Metropolitan Division code or NA, or is missing

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: State must = a valid FIPS code or (NA where MSA/MD = NA).
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: State does not = a valid state code or (state equals NA and MSA/MD not NA)

Loan/Application Register (only).Transaction Item(s): MSA/MD,State,County Codes (Columns K, L, and M)
Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If MSA/MD does not = NA, then MSA/MD, state, and county codes must = a valid combination.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: MSA/MD, state, and county codes do not = a valid combination

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: State and county must = a valid combination or (county = NA where MSA/MD = NA).
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: State/county does not equal a valid combination or (county equals NA and MSA/MD not NA)

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Census tract must = a valid census tract number for the MSA/MD, state, county combination or (NA if county is classified as small) or (where MSA/MD = NA the census tract must = a valid census tract for the state/county combination or NA). Valid census tract format must be NNNN.NN or NA, left justified.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Census tract not in valid format or is missing, does not equal NA, or does not equal a valid census tract number

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Applicant ethnicity must = 1, 2, 3, or 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant ethnicity is missing or not in range 1-4

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant ethnicity must = 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-Applicant ethnicity is missing or not in range 1-5

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant ethnicity does not = 5; however, co-applicant race field 1 = 8 and/or co-applicant sex = 5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: If no co-applicant, co-applicant ethnicity/race/sex combination invalid

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If applicant ethnicity = 1, 2 or 3 then the first applicant race field must not = 7.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant ethnicity = 1, 2 or 3; therefore first applicant race invalid

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If co-applicant ethnicity = 1, 2 or 3 then the first co-applicant race field must not = 7 or 8.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-applicant ethnicity = 1, 2 or 3; therefore first co-applicant race invalid

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Applicant race field 1 must = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant race field 1 is missing or is not in range 1-7

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If applicant race = 1-5 in applicant race field 1, then all other applicant race fields must = blank or 1-5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant race fields 2 - 5 are not blank or in range 1-5

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If applicant race = 6 or 7 in applicant race field 1, then all other applicant race fields must = blank.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant race field 1= 6 or 7; therefore all other applicant race fields must = blank

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Applicant race must not be the same (i.e. 1,1; 1,1,2; 1,2,3,4,1), when more than one applicant race is designated.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant race is the same

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant race field 1 must = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, or 8.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-Applicant race field 1 is missing or is not in range 1-8

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant race field 1 does not = 8; however, co-applicant ethnicity and/or co-applicant sex = 5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: If no co-applicant, co-applicant race/sex/ethnicity combination invalid

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If co-applicant race = 1-5 in co-applicant race field 1, then all other co-applicant race fields must = blank or 1-5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-Applicant race fields 2-5 are not blank or in range 1-5

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If co-applicant race = 6, 7, or 8 in co-applicant race field 1, then all other co-applicant race fields must = blank.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-Applicant race field 1 = 6, 7, or 8; therefore all other co-applicant race fields must = blank

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant race must not be the same (i.e. 1,1; 1,1,2; 1,2,3,4,1), when more than one co-applicant race is designated.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-Applicant race is the same

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Applicant sex must = 1, 2, 3, or 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant sex is missing or is not in range 1-4

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant sex must = 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-Applicant sex is missing or not in range 1-5

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant sex does not = 5; however, co-applicant ethnicity = 5 and/or co-applicant race field 1 = 8.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: If no co-applicant, co-applicant sex/ethnicity/race combination invalid

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Income must be numeric and > 0, or equal NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Income is zero, missing, negative or, if non-numeric, does not equal NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If property type = 3, then income must = NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Property type = 3; therefore income must = NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Type of purchaser must = 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, or 9.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Type of purchaser must be in range 0-9

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If type of purchaser = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, or 9, then action taken type must be 1 or 6.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Type of purchaser in range 1-9; therefore action taken should equal 1 or 6

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If type of purchaser = 2, then loan type must = 2, 3, or 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Purchaser type = 2 and loan type does not equal 2, 3, or 4

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If (agency code = 2, 3, 5, 7, or 9) or (agency code = 1 and action taken not = 3 or 7), then reasons for denial must = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, or blank.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Reasons for denial are not blank or in range 1-9

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Responses for reasons for denial must not be the same (i.e. 1,1; 1,1,2; 1,2,2;...........).
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Reasons for denial are the same

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If agency code = 1 and action taken = 3 or 7, then at least one reason for denial must be provided and must = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, or 9. Other reasons for denial must = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 or blank.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: For action taken = 3 or 7, at least one reason for denial not given, or reason for denial given not in range 1-9

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Rate spread must be in the NN.NN format, must not = blank, and if NA, left justified.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Rate spread is not in valid format or is missing

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If action taken type = 2-8, then rate spread must = NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken type = 2-8; therefore rate spread must = NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If lien status = 1, then rate spread must be > 1.5% and ≤ 99.99% or NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Lien status = 1; therefore rate spread must be in range ≥ 1.5% and ≤ 99.99% or NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If lien status = 2, then rate spread must be > 3.5% and ≤ 99.99% or NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Lien status = 2; therefore rate spread must be in range ≥ 3.5% and ≤ 99.99% or NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If lien status = 3, then rate spread must = NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Lien status = 3; therefore rate spread must = NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If action taken type = 2-5, 7, or 8, HOEPA status must = 2.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken type = 2-5, 7, or 8; therefore HOEPA status must = 2

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: HOEPA status must = 1 or 2.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: HOEPA status is missing or does not = 1 or 2

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If loan purpose = 1, then HOEPA status must = 2.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan purpose = 1; therefore HOEPA status must = 2

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If lien status = 3, then HOEPA status must = 2.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Lien status = 3; therefore HOEPA status must = 2

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Lien status must = 1, 2, 3, or 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Lien status is missing or not in range 1-4

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If loan purpose = 1 or 3, then lien status must = 1, 2, or 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan purpose = 1 or 3; therefore lien status must = 1, 2, or 4

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If action taken type = 1-5, 7 or 8, then lien status must = 1, 2, or 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken type = 1-5, 7 or 8; therefore lien status must = 1, 2, or 3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If action taken type = 6, then lien status must = 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken type = 6; therefore lien status must = 4
